text: Polash is a Bangladeshi singer. In 2012, he won the Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Male Playback Singer for the film Khodar Pore Ma. ==Selected films== * Bir Soinik - 2003 * Ayna - 2006 * Akkel Alir Nirbachon - 2008 * Evabey Bhalobasha Hoy - 2010 * Khodar Pore Ma - 2012 * Pita - 2012 * Antor Jala - 2017 ==Awards== {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 100%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Polash
